title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1403/93 of 8 June 1993 relating to the release of securities concerning certain STM licences and STM import licences applicable to Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1403/93 of 8 June 1993 relating to the release of securities concerning certain STM licences and STM import licences applicable to Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The securities provided under STM licences and STM import licences applicable in trade with Portugal, and still valid on 1 April 1993, shall be released in accordance with the provisions of Article 27 (2) of Commission Regulation (EEC) No  2220/85 (7).
The provisions of the preceding paragraph shall not apply to STM licences and STM import licences relating to oranges and apples other than cider apples.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 April 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 June 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 12.
(2) OJ No L 367, 31. 12. 1985, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 293, 27. 10. 1988, p. 7.
(4) OJ No L 77, 31. 3. 1993, p. 11.
(5) OJ No L 77, 31. 3. 1993, p. 9.
(6) OJ No L 93, 17. 4. 1993, p. 8.
(7) OJ No L 205, 3. 8. 1985, p. 5.
